rows.label: Start_Sakuraba_Caption
rows.name:
The central pillar of the Sakuraba
Group conglomerate, which enjoys
a reputation for excellent products.
Sakuraba firearms exhibit remarkable
stability and accuracy, qualities which
faithfully exemplify the design ethos
of their creators.

rows.label: Start_Granada_Caption
rows.name:
This new arms manufacturer is an
avid investor in beam-tech research.
Its best sellers are weapons that
emphasize quick cooldowns,
and protective wear that offers
high beam resistance.

rows.label: Start_Meredith_Caption
rows.name:
An innovative user of Growth tech
in the weapon-design field.
Its products have made waves for
their ability to harness ether,
a feat which has until now proven
difficult for human technology.

rows.label: Start_Morgu_Caption
rows.name:
This Ma-non arms manufacturer
specializes in solid defensive gear,
and is aiming to expand its market
with its lineup of bolt weapons.

rows.label: Start_Nopon_Caption
rows.name:
A commerce guild started by the
enterprising Nopon. Most of their
products are thermal weapons
that have been tuned to deliver
greater magazine capacity.

rows.label: Start_DrB_Caption
rows.name:
A privately-owned arms manufacturer
known for the unique aesthetics and
singular craftsmanship of its custom-
made products. It has quickly built
up a cult following of supporters.

rows.label: Start_Orfeu_Caption
rows.name:
An arms manufacturer made up of
Orpheans who defected from the
Growth to New LA. The architecture
of their gear differs greatly from
conventional human technology.
High-evasion protective wear
is their principle product.

rows.label: Start_Lars_Caption
rows.name:
The branch office of a Larsian
conglomerate that monopolized the
weapons market on its home planet.
Its mainstay lineup consists of high-
power weapons, and armor with
high physical resistance.

rows.label: LSuit_Sakuraba_Caption
rows.name:
Gravity keeping you down?
Then don this gear, the latest and
greatest in quality gravity resistance!
And of course, high physical
resistance is still a trait of all
Sakuraba wear.

rows.label: LSuit_Granada_Caption
rows.name:
If you're an operative who raves for
ranged weapons, this is your gear.
Presenting a top-of-the-line series
of protective wear expertly tuned
beyond medium-wear specs!

rows.label: LSuit_Meredith_Caption
rows.name:
This Meredith & Co. light wear,
infused with ether resistance, is a
boon of super technology. Don't hit
the battlefield without it!

rows.label: LSuit_Morgu_Caption
rows.name:
We researched you humans a lot
to come up with this bold piece,
you know? Isn't it so avant-garde?
Oh, and it works pretty well in
battles, if that's your thing.

rows.label: LSuit_Lars_Caption
rows.name:
A singular lineup of armor worthy
of the bold and battle-tested.
Wear these to gain freedom from
the cruel shackles of gravity.

rows.label: HSuit_Sakuraba_Caption
rows.name:
Only the ambitious survive.
Safeguard your life with our finest
defensive tech ever, and become
fearless on the front lines!

rows.label: HSuit_Granada_Caption
rows.name:
This new and improved lineup from
Grenada GG makes defense priority
one—obstructing those pesky one-hit
incapacitators at a proven high rate!
If you're a ranged-weapon junkie,
this is one set of gear you'll want
in your wardrobe ASAP.

rows.label: HSuit_Meredith_Caption
rows.name:
Meredith & Co. makes history again!
This heavy wear sports solid defense
that can resist a variety of attack
types. It's an essential component
of every operative's arsenal.

rows.label: HSuit_Morgu_Caption
rows.name:
This defense is going to make your
jaw drop, don't you think? Boltal
attacks won't even faze you.
Oh, and did we mention that this
lineup makes quite the fashion
statement? Trust us. I mean, we ARE
named Candid & CREDIBLE, right?

rows.label: HSuit_Orfeu_Caption
rows.name:
By pairing defense with evasion,
we've engineered invincibility.

rows.label: HSuit_Lars_Caption
rows.name:
It's conviction that makes one strong.
Presenting the ultimate armor for
those who refuse to retreat.

rows.label: PSuit_Sakuraba_Caption
rows.name:
This wear has been delicately tuned
exclusively for pilots to deliver the
only definitive Doll experience.
Adaptation is a choice—become one
with your Doll today!

rows.label: PSuit_Granada_Caption
rows.name:
We've taken your requests to heart
and engineered a new Grenada line
to satisfy the needs of today's pilots.
It's also great for fighting on foot!

rows.label: UPG1_Sakuraba_Caption
rows.name:
Thank you for choosing Sakuraba.
We are happy to announce that our
entire lineup has been upgraded with
a selection of fine battle traits.

rows.label: UPG1_Granada_Caption
rows.name:
As a sign of customer appreciation,
all products have been upgraded
with battle traits. Drop by the shop
to see our improved wares.

rows.label: UPG1_Meredith_Caption
rows.name:
Change is nature's way.
Behold our new lineup of
battle-trait-infused products!

rows.label: UPG1_Morgu_Caption
rows.name:
Thank you for your support.
We added some bells and whistles to
make our gear stronger, so we think
you'll probably like it?

rows.label: UPG1_Nopon_Caption
rows.name:
Friends' generosity is welcome!
As thank-you gift, Nopon add
battle traits to full product line.
Friends can see for themselves
at shop terminal!

rows.label: UPG1_DrB_Caption
rows.name:
I threw in some battle traits just for
you. There's still plenty of room for
upgrading though. But you know
what that means—I need more
miranium, stat!

rows.label: UPG1_Orfeu_Caption
rows.name:
We are not averse to miranium.
It is required to give form to the
conceptual, after all.

rows.label: UPG1_Lars_Caption
rows.name:
Your tribute is most appreciated.
Allow us to repay you through
our fine wares.

rows.label: UPG2_Sakuraba_Caption
rows.name:
Thank you for choosing Sakuraba.
We are happy to announce that our
entire lineup has been upgraded
with an even newer selection
of battle traits.

rows.label: UPG2_Granada_Caption
rows.name:
As a sign of customer appreciation,
all of our products have been further
upgraded with battle traits. Drop by
the shop to see our improved wares!

rows.label: UPG2_Meredith_Caption
rows.name:
Further change is nature's way.
Behold our new lineup of
battle-trait-infused products!

rows.label: UPG2_Morgu_Caption
rows.name:
Thank you for your support.
We added even more bells and
whistles to make our gear stronger,
all right? Hopefully you'll like it?

rows.label: UPG2_Nopon_Caption
rows.name:
Friends' generosity is neverending!
As thank-you gift, Nopon add new
battle traits to full product line.
Friends can see for themselves
at shop terminal!

rows.label: UPG2_DrB_Caption
rows.name:
It's not often you find youngsters
with your gumption. But that's the
last set of upgrades you get
outta me! I'll thank you to leave me
to my lonesome from now on.

rows.label: UPG2_Orfeu_Caption
rows.name:
We are not averse to miranium.
Thank you. ...Yes, that is an apt
verbalization for our feelings.

rows.label: UPG2_Lars_Caption
rows.name:
Your tribute is worthy of a song!
Allow us to repay you through
our fine wares.

rows.label: ASSAULT_Caption
rows.name:
Nothing is impossible with Sakuraba
in your arsenal. When locked in
combat with a foe, lock on to THEM
with our fine beam weaponry.
We guarantee results.

rows.label: KNIFE_Caption
rows.name:
Sakuraba breaks new ground again!
Introducing the latest addition to our
ground-gear lineup—an bolt
line of knives guaranteed to
send piscinoids running.

rows.label: SNIPER_Caption
rows.name:
At Sakuraba, evolution never pauses.
Finally, the secrets of ether technology
have been tapped to bring you the
one and only Sniper II series.

rows.label: RAYGUN_Caption
rows.name:
It's a raygun revolution from
Grenada! This new design
incorporates thermal tech,
allowing you to efficiently
lay waste to theroid foes!

rows.label: LONG_Caption
rows.name:
Finally, an bolt longsword for the
operative who's a cut above the rest.
Choose trendy. Choose Grenada.

rows.label: GATLING_Caption
rows.name:
No one can hold a candle to
Meredith tech. We've proven that in
the Mashine II series—gravity guns
that incorporate xenoform knowledge.
Gravitate yourself to one today!

rows.label: PSYCHO_Caption
rows.name:
Meredith is breathing new life into
the psycho-launcher market with its
all-new Magi III line. Come see the
Meredith difference for yourself.

rows.label: PHOTON_Caption
rows.name:
The Candela III photon saber is
Meredith's latest in gravity-based
gear. Cut foes down with a mighty
blow that bends space-time itself!

rows.label: JAVELIN_Caption
rows.name:
Long before the pen, we took spear
in hand. By melding this noble
weapon with ether technology,
we bring to you the Pilum II line—
javelins of unrivaled destructive force.
A new chapter in human history
starts here and now.

rows.label: DUALGUN_Caption
rows.name:
Want to turn mechanoids into slag?
Then you need some solid gravity
weapons in your arsenal!

rows.label: SHIELD_Caption
rows.name:
Have we got something for you!
These babies are too heavy for us
to use, but they'd be no problem
for you guys, you know?

rows.label: DUALBL_Caption
rows.name:
These twin swords of flame emit a
keen flash, and boast the power to
rend evil. None but the worthiest
may wield them.

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba01_Caption
rows.name:
Dolls will never be the same!
Powered by a fifth-generation particle
generator and fit for a dreadnought-
class warship, this six-barrel cannon
is the pinnacle of Doll weaponry.
Equip your squad with the stopping
power of a fleet!

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba02_Caption
rows.name:
A technical feat worthy of the
Sakuraba name. The electromagnetic
induction barrel has been shortened,
yet particle acceleration has doubled!
With a long-range accuracy of 98.5
percent, it's the perfect choice for
picking off distant targets.

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba03_Caption
rows.name:
Sakuraba, the leader in particle
research, unveils its latest master-
piece. But what kind of weapon
is it? Physical? Beam? Bolt?
No, there's only one force felling foes
in today's era—gravity! So be a
winner and get with gravity today!

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba04_Caption
rows.name:
Introducing Sakuraba's ultimate
combat drill—the very weapon you
dreamed of owning as a kid.
We've redesigned this mining tool
for maximum efficiency, and also
given it a rocket booster for extra
velocity. Don't just drill—dream!

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba05_Caption
rows.name:
Are your Doll arms crushed?
Are you ready to give up? Stop!
Instead, deploy two EXTRA arms and
power your way to total victory!
You'll marvel as foes are reduced to
ribbons by the 10 swords affixed to
the patented power frame!

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba06_Caption
rows.name:
Air support? Let's get dead instead!
YOU become the artillery in this high
risk offensive. Just make sure your
Doll is insured, because the only
way out is in a slag bag!
* This product is non-refundable.

rows.label: HYWPN_Sakuraba07_Caption
rows.name:
Sniping enthusiasts, rejoice!
Ammunition for this model features
an integrated optic sensor able to
modify trajectory for pesky moving
targets. But wait! There's more!
It also features a triple-layer explosive
that damages the thickest armor.

rows.label: HYWPN_Granada01_Caption
rows.name:
Forged from a newly developed steel
variant of incredible denseness, these
tiny powerhouses allow for blows of
earth-shattering force. Each blade
also comes fitted with attitude-control
thrusters—perfect for letting loose a
rapid flurry of dual sword swipes.

rows.label: HYWPN_Granada02_Caption
rows.name:
The apex of weaponized wave
emitters! Panels on the shoulders
send out stun waves that incapacitate
both living organisms and alien
weaponry alike. It also comes with a
jamming feature that protects your
Doll from irksome enemy missiles.

rows.label: HYWPN_Granada03_Caption
rows.name:
The devastating power of an aerial
offense is now available in a Doll!
When a high-altitude raid or orbital
strike isn't an option, you can still
rain destruction on your foes from 
above with this single unit.
* Not for use inside caves.

rows.label: HYWPN_Granada04_Caption
rows.name:
This weapon's power becomes clear
when engaging multiple foes at close
range. Each of the many independently
moving blades revolves at blinding
speed to rip and rend nearby foes,
pushing them back in the perfect
marriage of offense and defense.

rows.label: HYWPN_Meredith01_Caption
rows.name:
Developed using ancient alien tech,
this weapon launches a homing spear
with both bolt and physical
properties. Fire and forget—because
it never misses the mark!

rows.label: HYWPN_Meredith02_Caption
rows.name:
With this weapon in hand, even
Mother Nature will be your ally!
Particles in the atmosphere are
electrostatically induced to create an
enemy-razing lightning storm of one
hundred million volts.

rows.label: HYWPN_Meredith03_Caption
rows.name:
Many claim to sell the ultimate
weapon, but until now, none
could claim the ultimate defense.
The cloak deployed from this shield
renders Dolls invincible, while a
360 degree barrage of beams rids
the vicinity of all aggressors.

rows.label: Blade_LV1_Caption
rows.name:
New wall decals are now available
in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV2_Caption
rows.name:
A new holofigure projector is now
available in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV3_Caption
rows.name:
New lighting options are now
available in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV4_Caption
rows.name:
New room colors are now
available in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV5_Caption
rows.name:
New holofigure projectors are now
available in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV6_Caption
rows.name:
New wall decals are now available
in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV7_Caption
rows.name:
New holofigure projectors are now
available in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV8_Caption
rows.name:
New room colors are now
available in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV9_Caption
rows.name:
New room locations can now be
customized in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Blade_LV10_Caption
rows.name:
New wall decals are now available
in the BLADE Home.

rows.label: Npc_uni0001_Data
rows.name:
The White Whale's former captain, Nagi is now defense secretary of
New LA. He is a plainspoken individual who looks upon his BLADE
brethren with warmth. He is also a iaijutsu master, and rumored to
be the best combatant in all of BLADE.

rows.label: Npc_uni0002_Data
rows.name:
A native of planet Mira. Though eerily statuesque by human standards,
Lu's looks offer a sharp contrast to his whimsical speech and folksy
personality. His immense knowledge has gained him the trust of
both Nagi and Vandham.

rows.label: Npc_uni0003_Data
rows.name:
Though outwardly calm and collected, conflicting emotions burn in Lao's
heart. Hailed as BLADE's best marksman, he possesses even Elma's
respect. He and Doug are war buddies with a lengthy history.

rows.label: Npc_uni0004_Data
rows.name:
Hector Birtwhistle is a logical man armed with untiring ambition and
scholarly acumen. His judgment places the interests of the human race
above all else—at times resulting in a rather cold impression.

rows.label: Npc_uni0005_Data
rows.name:
An honest man with an unshakable sense of justice—if not the sharpest
tool in the shed. Gwin admires his commanding officer Irina and yearns
to protect her, though a lack of ability has prevented him from fully
realizing this noble goal.

rows.label: Npc_uni0006_Data
rows.name:
Frye can often be found at the local diner knocking back an off-duty
drink. On the clock, however, he undertakes missions that most
operatives bend over backwards to avoid. This daring has earned
him the unusual nickname of "Killer Ostrich."

rows.label: Npc_uni0007_Data
rows.name:
Doug is stern in appearance, but rather meek in demeanor.
When one of Lin's Doll tests ends in failure, he usually takes the flak.
He's a competent fighter, however—especially when in a Doll cockpit.

rows.label: Npc_uni0008_Data
rows.name:
Foul-mouthed and quick-tempered, Yelv isn't a conventional example of
BLADE's finest—though he will open his heart to those he respects.
He tends to hang out in the commercial district, and similar to the
protagonist, has some issues with his memories of past events.

rows.label: Npc_uni0009_Data
rows.name:
A veteran soldier with a service record dating back to Coalition army
days. He went on to become a military-academy instructor, and trained
many active BLADEs. Bozé is also deeply interested in certain facets of
eastern Earth culture.

rows.label: Npc_uni0010_Data
rows.name:
Phog is quite shy, and adheres to his own natural rhythm above all.
Due to these unique qualities, he prefers to carry out assignments alone.
His genius-like traits have, however, nurtured excellent skills in the field.

rows.label: Npc_uni0011_Data
rows.name:
A former colonel in the Coalition Special Operations Heavy Armor
Training Unit—more casually known as the "Dolleton Crew."
Few operatives can match Elma in combat, either in or out of a Doll.

rows.label: Npc_uni0012_Data
rows.name:
Lin is a genius mechanic whose skills extend to Doll tech and beyond.
She has a bubbly personality, treating everyone with equal warmth.
Though young, she bears a passion for justice and a fierce will to live.

rows.label: Npc_uni0013_Data
rows.name:
A kindhearted Qlurian who drifted to Mira along with Rock.
Celica's gentle demeanor and strong sense of responsibility enable her
to aid those in need, and she strives endlessly to protect her
counterpart Rock from engaging in any kind of conflict.

rows.label: Npc_uni0014_Data
rows.name:
Gutsy but cool-headed, Irina devotes her entire being to protecting the
people of New LA. Back in her Dolleton Crew days, Irina served under
Elma, a leader for whom she still maintains strong adoration.

rows.label: Npc_uni0015_Data
rows.name:
The Murderess's remarkable skills are contrasted by a mysterious focus
on money that leads her to betray others without a second thought.
Such a reputation means that no operative wants to team up with her
if they can help it, and as such, her true ambitions remain unclear.

rows.label: Npc_uni0016_Data
rows.name:
A weapons tester for the Arms. Axena loves machines and gadgets
above all else, and is happiest when in a Doll cockpit.

rows.label: Npc_uni0017_Data
rows.name:
A Companion revered throughout New LA for her selfless devotion to
helping citizens with their troubles. Though not proficient in combat,
she toils tirelessly for the cause in her own way.

rows.label: Npc_uni0018_Data
rows.name:
A junior BLADE who is still learning the ropes, but has managed to
survive a number of trials with a touch of luck and lots of tenacity.
Her next goal is to be placed on the same team with a particular
operative she looks up to...

rows.label: Npc_uni0001_Sp
rows.name:
Nagi is a skilled warrior capable of engaging several enemies at once.
He uses a unique style based on the General Sword class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0002_Sp
rows.name:
L gives equal support to all comrades, no matter where they hail from.
He uses a unique style based on the Shield Battler class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0003_Sp
rows.name:
Lao uses a standard Long Lancer style to engage in ranged combat
while also keeping melee enemies at bay.

rows.label: Npc_uni0004_Sp
rows.name:
H.B. is a strategist who can calmly formulate a battle plan for any situation.
He uses a unique style based on the Shield Battler class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0005_Sp
rows.name:
Gwin uses a standard Samurai Gunner style to fearlessly charge into
the fray—often leaving his comrades to clean up the aftermath.

rows.label: Npc_uni0006_Sp
rows.name:
Frye is able to cover broad areas of the battlefield with his gatling volleys.
He uses a unique style based on the Samurai Gunner class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0007_Sp
rows.name:
No predicament is too daunting for Doug, who uses a unique style
based on the Blast Fencer class to do battle on the front lines.

rows.label: Npc_uni0008_Sp
rows.name:
Yelv wields a fearsome photon saber, which he extols as the ultimate
weapon. His unique style is based on the Blast Fencer class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0009_Sp
rows.name:
Bozé uses a standard Long Lancer style for both ranged and melee
encounters, regardless of enemy numbers.

rows.label: Npc_uni0010_Sp
rows.name:
Phog uses a standard Sword Fang style. His proficiency with a blade
is most apparent when in dangerous situations.

rows.label: Npc_uni0011_Sp
rows.name:
Elma's twin swords are complemented by dual firearms which she wields
with deadly skill in a standard Full Metal Jaguar style.

rows.label: Npc_uni0012_Sp
rows.name:
Though small in frame, Lin wields a massive shield to valiantly engage
foes up close—a hallmark of her standard Shield Battler style.

rows.label: Npc_uni0013_Sp
rows.name:
Celica uses a unique style based on the Psychic Seeker class to unleash
a variety of debuffs that chip away at enemy vitality.

rows.label: Npc_uni0014_Sp
rows.name:
Irina aids allies by using recovery techniques with areas of effect.
Her unique style is based on the Psychic Seeker class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0015_Sp
rows.name:
The Murderess ruthlessly cuts down foes before they can counterattack.
Her unique style is based on the Sword Fang class.

rows.label: Npc_uni0016_Sp
rows.name:
Axena uses a unique style based on the Long Lancer class.
To her, fighting from a Doll cockpit is sheer ecstasy.

rows.label: Npc_uni0017_Sp
rows.name:
Hope uses a unique style based on the Psychic Seeker class,
balancing buffs and debuffs to support allies while weakening foes.

rows.label: Npc_uni0018_Sp
rows.name:
Miia uses a standard Psychic Seeker style to unleash barrages of
cannon fire that damage enemies from a safe distance.

rows.label: Npc_uni0022_Data
rows.name:
Pilot of the Ares and hero who saved the White Whale,
Al was declared M.I.A. after the crash-landing on Mira,
but miraculously returned from the rift between worlds.
A willful type, he seems put off by the title of "hero."

rows.label: Npc_uni0022_Sp
rows.name:
Al uses a unique style based on the General Sword class, taking on
opponents with dauntless courage and explosive firepower.

rows.label: Npc_uni0020_Data
rows.name:
A Qlurian archaeologist studying xenoform civilizations.
Though at the top of Qlurian social hierarchy, her warm,
affable personality makes her easy to get along with. As
a scholar, she is curious to learn about human customs.

rows.label: Npc_uni0021_Data
rows.name:
A test pilot hired by an arms manufacturer, Liesel was
involved in the development of Hraesvelg, a new Doll.
Once a member of the German air force, she approaches
things coolly—but beneath is a warm and caring person.

rows.label: Npc_uni0062_Data
rows.name:
Leader of the Larsian mercenaries and former prince,
Ga-Derg rejected the Growth to side with humans.
A believer in loyalty and honor and a true warrior, whose
virtues impress his people and his second, Ga Buidhe.

rows.label: Npc_uni0020_Sp
rows.name:
Boasting a unique style based on the Full Metal Jaguar, Neil
provides ranged support and slices foes with twin swords.

rows.label: Npc_uni0021_Sp
rows.name:
Liesel uses a unique style based on the Long Lancer,
proving equally as capable in melee as she is in a Doll.

rows.label: Npc_uni0062_Sp
rows.name:
Ga-Derg's unique style is based on the Galaxy Knight,
seamlessly blending Larsian skill with BLADE technology.
